dict.string:
This sample illustrates how to create a custom transition when navigating between two collection views in a navigation hierarchy managed by a navigation controller. The transition can be interrupted and reversed. It uses a subclass of UICollectionViewTransitionLayout to help in the transition of the cell positions based on gesture position.
The application has two view collection view controllers that display images. The first is a stack view, the second is a grid view. You can transition from the stack to the grid by tapping on the stack. You can also use a pinch gesture, in which case you can control the speed of, and even reverse, the transition.${PRODUCT_NAME:rfc1034identifier}
